title: Can't compile with gcc 6.4 and cuda 9
body_html:
When compiling pytorch 0.2 with gcc 6.4 and cuda 9 on Arch Linux I get these issues: log.txt

The error is:

/build/python-pytorch/src/pytorch-0.2.0-py2-cuda/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorMathPairwise.cu(66): error: more than one operator "!=" matches these operands:
            function "operator!=(const __half &, const __half &)"
            function "operator!=(half, half)"
            operand types are: half != half

I'm the cuda and pytorch maintainer in Arch and this is currently blocking a rebuild so help is highly appreciated.

body:
When compiling pytorch 0.2 with gcc 6.4 and cuda 9 on Arch Linux I get these issues: [log.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1356097/log.txt)

The error is:

```
/build/python-pytorch/src/pytorch-0.2.0-py2-cuda/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorMathPairwise.cu(66): error: more than one operator "!=" matches these operands:
            function "operator!=(const __half &, const __half &)"
            function "operator!=(half, half)"
            operand types are: half != half
```

I'm the cuda and pytorch maintainer in Arch and this is currently blocking a rebuild so help is highly appreciated.
